## Quick Start

### New to JavaMT5?
- Check out the [Getting Started Guide](https://metarpc.github.io/JavaMT5/GETTING_STARTED/)
- Browse the [Documentation](https://metarpc.github.io/JavaMT5/)
- Run the [Examples](https://metarpc.github.io/JavaMT5/RUNNING_EXAMPLES/)

### Need Help?
1. **Search first** - Your question might already be answered
2. **Use templates** - When creating a new discussion, select the appropriate category
3. **Be specific** - Include code, errors, and environment details
4. **Attach files** - Screenshots, logs, and ZIPs help us help you faster

### Discussion Categories

- **ğŸ’¬ Q&A** - Ask "how do I...?" questions
- **ğŸ› Bug Reports** - Something not working? Let us know
- **ğŸ’¡ Ideas** - Suggest improvements and new features
- **ğŸ“š Show and Tell** - Share your trading bots and projects
- **ğŸ“¢ Announcements** - Stay updated with latest news

## Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and constructive
- Search before posting
- Stay on topic
- Remove sensitive data (API keys, account numbers, passwords)
- Help others when you can
